dct_description_sm: Published according to Act of Parliament by John Walker, Geographer to the Secretary of State for India in Council. Feby. 22nd. 1862 ; Captn. G.H. Saxton, Lieutts. G.C. Depree, H.L. Thuillier, R. Smyth & Mr. J. Fitzpatrick, Surveyors ; Engraved, by J. & C. Walker.
Relief shown by hachures and spot heights
Shows administrative divisions, roads, railways, towns, waterways
Includes area west of Odisha's north east coast
Publishment and responsibility information not included when map was mounted (information taken from LC raster image)
Map includes more coverage than 1862 version.
1862 version (and atlas index) available through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
